body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have "Kessig Wolf Run" in play
2. Use the ability of "Kessig Wolf Run"
3. You can choose "Kessig Wolf Run" to pay the mana cost for the ability What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The card should not be able to pay for its own ability. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.33 on Windows 7 Professional 64-bit SP1
